item.title: Jodi add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jodi add a quote by Epicurus
item.description: "Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for." -- Epicurus

item.title: Jodi add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "There is nothing like returning to a place that remains unchanged to find the ways in which you yourself have altered." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Jodi add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed." -- Carl Gustav Jung

item.title: Jodi add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Jodi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I think we dream so we don't have to be apart so long. If we're in each other's dreams, we can play together all night." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Jodi add a quote by Hal Boyle
item.description: "What makes a river so restful to people is that it doesn't have any doubt - it is sure to get where it is going, and it doesn't want to go anywhere else" -- Hal Boyle

item.title: Jodi add a quote by Francois Duc de la Rochefoucauld
item.description: "Absence diminishes small loves and increases great ones, as the wind blows out the candle and fans the bonfire." -- Francois Duc de la Rochefoucauld
